attributes.action: Keep David Cameron as Prime Minister for the remainder of his parliamentary term
attributes.additional_details: We need his European expertise, relationships, and passion for delivering what is in the best interests of the people of the U.K.
attributes.background: David Cameron pledged to deliver a referendum to the UK as part of his election manifesto. He fulfilled this pledge and the public voted. The results of this referendum have no bearing on his ability to lead our nation and at a time of turmoil, we need more than ever,  that strong leadership.
